description:
Uninstalling this package removes the Visual Studio Installer, which remains present after the Visual Studio product packages (such as [visualstudio2017enterprise](https://chocolatey.org/packages/visualstudio2017enterprise) or [visualstudio2019buildtools](https://chocolatey.org/packages/visualstudio2019buildtools)) are uninstalled.

This package does not install anything by itself.
summary: Provides a way to uninstall the Visual Studio Installer.
author: Microsoft
